{

  "properties": {
    "recommendationName": "IoT_OpenPorts",
    "recommendationDisplayName": "Device has open ports",
    "recommendationTypeId": "",

    "description": "Found a listening endpoint on the device.",
    "logAnalyticsQuery": "SecurityRecommendation | where tolower(AssessedResourceId) == tolower('/subscriptions/075423e9-7d33-4166-8bdf-3920b04e3735/resourceGroups/MichalResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs/MichalDemoHub') and tolower(RecommendationName) == tolower('IoT_OpenPorts') and TimeGenerated  < now()"
  }
